```{=html}
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // Tab switching functionality
    const tabButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-button');
    const tabContents = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-content');
    
    // Initialize - show only first tab
    showTab('1');
    
    // Tab button click handlers
    tabButtons.forEach(button => {
        button.addEventListener('click', function() {
            const weekNum = this.dataset.week;
            showTab(weekNum);
            
            // Update active tab button
            tabButtons.forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active'));
            this.classList.add('active');
        });
    });
    
    // Filter functionality
    document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        if (e.target.classList.contains('filter-button')) {
            const filter = e.target.dataset.filter;
            const tabContent = e.target.closest('.tab-content');
            const weekNum = tabContent.dataset.week;
            
            // Update active filter button within this tab
            const tabFilters = tabContent.querySelectorAll('.filter-button');
            tabFilters.forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active'));
            e.target.classList.add('active');
            
            // Apply filter to current tab
            filterContent(filter, weekNum);
        }
    });
    
    function showTab(weekNum) {
        // Hide all tabs
        tabContents.forEach(content => {
            content.classList.remove('active');
        });
        
        // Show selected tab
        const selectedTab = document.querySelector(`[data-week="${weekNum}"].tab-content`);
        if (selectedTab) {
            selectedTab.classList.add('active');
            
            // Reset filters for this tab
            const tabFilters = selectedTab.querySelectorAll('.filter-button');
            tabFilters.forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active'));
            const allFilter = selectedTab.querySelector('.filter-button[data-filter="all"]');
            if (allFilter) {
                allFilter.classList.add('active');
            }
            
            // Show all content by default
            filterContent('all', weekNum);
        }
    }
    
    function filterContent(filter, weekNum) {
        const tabContent = document.querySelector(`[data-week="${weekNum}"].tab-content`);
        if (!tabContent) return;
        
        const dayRows = tabContent.querySelectorAll('.day-row');
        
        dayRows.forEach(row => {
            if (filter === 'all') {
                // Show all rows
                row.style.display = 'grid';
                
                // Show all columns
                const columns = row.querySelectorAll('.topic, .lab-quiz, .worksheet');
                columns.forEach(col => {
                    col.style.display = 'block';
                });
            } else {
                // Check if this row has content for the selected filter
                const hasFilterContent = row.querySelector(`.${filter}-content`) && 
                                        !row.querySelector(`.${filter}-content`).classList.contains('empty-cell');
                
                if (hasFilterContent || row.querySelector('.special-note') || row.querySelector('.quiz-item')) {
                    row.style.display = 'grid';
                    
                    // Hide/show specific columns based on filter
                    const topicColumn = row.querySelector('.topic');
                    const labColumn = row.querySelector('.lab-quiz');
                    const worksheetColumn = row.querySelector('.worksheet');
                    
                    if (filter === 'lectures') {
                        topicColumn.style.display = topicColumn.classList.contains('lectures-content') || 
                                                  topicColumn.classList.contains('special-note') || 
                                                  topicColumn.classList.contains('quiz-item') ? 'block' : 'none';
                        labColumn.style.display = 'none';
                        worksheetColumn.style.display = 'none';
                    } else if (filter === 'labs') {
                        topicColumn.style.display = 'none';
                        labColumn.style.display = labColumn.classList.contains('labs-content') ? 'block' : 'none';
                        worksheetColumn.style.display = 'none';
                    } else if (filter === 'worksheets') {
                        topicColumn.style.display = 'none';
                        labColumn.style.display = 'none';
                        worksheetColumn.style.display = worksheetColumn.classList.contains('worksheets-content') ? 'block' : 'none';
                    } else if (filter === 'quizzes') {
                        topicColumn.style.display = topicColumn.classList.contains('quizzes-content') ? 'block' : 'none';
                        labColumn.style.display = 'none';
                        worksheetColumn.style.display = 'none';
                    }
                } else {
                    row.style.display = 'none';
                }
            }
        });
    }
    
    // Add smooth hover effects
    const weekSections = document.querySelectorAll('.week-section');
    weekSections.forEach(section => {
        section.addEventListener('mouseenter', function() {
            this.style.transform = 'translateY(-2px)';
        });
        
        section.addEventListener('mouseleave', function() {
            this.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
        });
    });
});
</script>
```
